com.zeitheron.hammercore.tile.tooltip.own

Interface ITooltip

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuiTooltip

    public interface ITooltip

      Appends an element to the left end of the line.

    • Method Detail

      • append

        void append(IRenderableInfo info)
        Appends an element to the left end of the line.
        Parameters:
        info - - the object that's going to be rendered.

      • newLine

        void newLine()
        Finalizes the current line and begins to store new one.

      • getLocation

        @Nullable
WorldLocation getLocation()

      • getEntity

        @Nullable
net.minecraft.entity.Entity getEntity()

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Gets the total width of the tooltip. It's calculated using max{widthln 1; widthln 2; ...; widthln n}
        Returns:
        the width of the tooltip

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Gets the total height of the tooltip. It's calculated using heightln 1 + heightln 2 + ... + heightln n
        Returns:
        the height of the tooltip

      • render

        void render(float x,
            float y,
            float partialTime)
        Renders current tooltip that was stored.
        Parameters:
        x - - the X offset of the tooltip
        y - - the Y offset of the tooltip
        partialTime - - the Minecraft's partial tick time. Passed in GUIs, render events, TESRs.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Clears current tooltip and resets width, height, x and y of renderer
